definition: misfortune turns to blessing (idiom); to turn an inauspicious start to good account
to meet by chance/to come across/(of a calendar event) to come along/(of an event) to fall on (a particular day)/to fawn upon
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]
surname Ji/abbr. for Jilin Province 吉林省[Ji2 lin2 Sheng3]

sentences.english: The task force of four sisters, peace together.
sentences.chinese: 特遣队四姐妹逢凶化吉，平安汇合。

sentences.english: The old monk smiled and said, “Distinguished guests have come and calamities can be turned into blessings.”
sentences.chinese: 老僧笑道，贵客到此，可逢凶化吉。

sentences.english: But the fell on his feet and found a better job very soon.
sentences.chinese: 不过他逢凶化吉，很快便找到了更理想的工作。

definition: to turn peril into safety (idiom); to avert disaster
everything is going smoothly/just as one wishes
the time comes, fortune turns (idiom); to have a lucky break/things change for the better
to seek luck and avoid calamity (idiom)
to have one's wishes come true/wish you the best!
lucky star in the ascendant (idiom); a lucky sign
see 吉人自有天相[ji2 ren2 zi4 you3 tian1 xiang4]
